pages.text: The $(thing)Rite of Spring$() is one of many growth and fertility Ceremonies available to a Totemist. After activating, nearby $(emph)animals$() will $(emph)breed$() one at a time, provided the respective $(emph)food items$() are laying on the ground. There is a decent chance that the food will not be consumed.$(br2)Along with that, any nearby saplings will transform into $(l:basics/cedar_tree)Red Cedar Saplings$().
